column4: i'm running Ubuntu 64-bit and for some reason i can't get my java apps to work anymore
for some reason everytime i open Azureus it closes about 2 seconds later, does anybody know how to fix this?
You said your java wasn't working, right?  Isn't Azureus Java based?
well, it opens... which makes me think that it might not be java, so i decided to be more specific, if the answer i gets works, then it's not my java
